<html><body><div><div class="article-body" data-v-2899190a>  <p data-v-2899190a><span class="dateline"><strong>CHICAGO</strong> - </span>A suspect accused of fatally shooting another man during an argument on Chicago’s West Side is in custody, police said.</p> <p id="taboola-mid-article-thumbnails" data-v-2899190a></p> <p id="taboola-mid-article-thumbnails-js" data-v-2899190a></p> <p data-ad-pos="inread" data-ad-size="1x1" class="ad gpt" data-v-2899190a></p><p original-article-post="" origination_station="WFLD" data-v-ec26887a data-v-2899190a>What we know:</p> <p data-v-2899190a>Fabian Rawls, 28, of Yorkville, was arrested Sunday in the 7000 block of South Harlem Avenue in Bridgeview and charged with first-degree murder, according to Chicago police.</p>  <div original-article-post="" origination_station="WFLD" class="full-width-image" data-v-0dea8073 data-v-2899190a><img src="https://images.foxtv.com/static.fox32chicago.com/www.fox32chicago.com/content/uploads/2026/02/932/524/arrest-gfx-.jpg?ve=1&amp;tl=1" alt="" data-v-0dea8073> <div class="info" data-v-0dea8073><p data-v-0dea8073><span data-v-0dea8073>Pictured is Fabian Rawls, 28.</span> <span data-v-0dea8073><strong data-v-0dea8073> (Chicago PD )</strong></span></p> </div></div> <p data-v-2899190a>The charge stems from a Jan. 30 shooting in the 4800 block of West Ferdinand Street that left a 35-year-old man dead, police said.</p> <p data-v-2899190a>The victim was standing outside when he became involved in an argument with Rawls, who allegedly pulled out a gun and opened fire, police said. The man was shot in the head and torso and taken to Mount Sinai Hospital, where he was pronounced dead.</p> <p data-v-2899190a>Police said Rawls fled the scene in a red minivan.</p> <p original-article-post="" origination_station="WFLD" data-v-ec26887a data-v-2899190a>What's next:</p> <p data-v-2899190a>Rawls is scheduled to appear in court Feb. 4 for a detention hearing.</p> <div original-article-post="" origination_station="WFLD" class="group-source-title" data-v-4fbf7207 data-v-2899190a><p class="group-source-paragraph" data-v-4fbf7207><b data-v-4fbf7207>The Source:</b> The information in this article was provided by the Chicago Police Department. </p></div>     <p data-uid="fts-ar-17" class="vendor-unit" data-v-2899190a></p></div></div></body></html>
